name: Creamy Potato Salad
description: Hey potato pals! We’d like to introduce you to our favourite costar to your sizzling summer barbeque. Whether you're dishing it up alongside a juicy chicken breast, smoky ribs, or a grilled veggie skewer, this potato salad knows how to play nice with all your BBQ favorites. Want to take it to the next level? Let it chill overnight in the fridge. Flavors mingle, potatoes absorb the seasoning, and you end up with a flavour bomb. Plus, making it in advance means stress-free entertaining. Win-win!

ingredients.name: Yukon Gold potatoes, about 4 medium potatoes

preparation: Bring water to boil in 8-Cup Multipurpose Pot, with lid on. Place eggs in boiling water. Cook 8–10 min. Drain, cool in ice water, peel, and chop.
Meanwhile, peel and dice potatoes; place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high until cooked, about 6 min. Once cooked, uncover; place in fridge to cool down.
Meanwhile, dice celery. Slice green onions.

When potatoes have cooled slightly, add the eggs, celery, and green onions to the Multipurpose Steamer. Pour dressing on top. Toss to combine and coat potatoes. Generously shake on topper and add additional toppings, if desired.
tips: This potato salad is delicious served at room temperature, but if you prefer a cold salad, simply cover and refrigerate before serving. Add topper right before serving.
Switch things up and try the vinaigrette salad dressing variation (recipe on pkg).
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup veggies, your choice.

products.name: Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix
summary: The ultimate summer salad, just add a few simple ingredients to make the most delish potato salad with notes of dill and a hint of sweetness. Each jar makes 6 cups of creamy or vinaigrette-style dressing so you can easily feed a crowd at a backyard barbecue.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavors or colors (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
